roleset.name: sharpen
roleset.note: STROP-V NOTES: Frames file for 'strop' based on sentences in brown. (from strop.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: He found tepid water in a pitcher and a last bit of soap , and [he]-1 lathered his face and stood [*-1]stropping the razor on his broad leather belt , its buckle held [*] firm by a knob of the bedpost .
example.arg: on his broad leather belt , its buckle held [*] firm by a knob of the bedpost
